resources.string:
This application helps you to manage your passwords by remembering them for you. You can set a single master password to unlock all your passwords and can copy them directly to the clip-board. 
 
 Auto-suggestion provides you a secure hashed password which can be stored, thus, providing high levels of security. 

 The application is still in beta-testing phase so please send the suggestions to 'nawazmohtashim@gmail.com' or contribute at 'github.com/mohtashim-nawaz/PasswordManager' 

 Please name all your accounts differently.
